diagnosis:

        ```yaml
name: Fixed Workflow
on:
  workflow_dispatch:
  push:
    branches: [main]
  pull_request:
    branches: [main]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v4
    - name: Setup
      run: echo "Workflow fixed"
        ```
